meanings.sent1: The princess was garbed in a beautiful gown for the royal ball.
meanings.sent2: She always felt special when garbed in her favorite dress.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked quite garbed in its tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The forest was garbed in a blanket of colorful leaves.
meanings.sent5: The superhero was garbed in a cape that billowed behind him as he flew.

meanings.definition: To clothe or dress in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: She garbed herself in warm layers before heading out into the snow.
meanings.sent2: The stylist garbed the model in the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: He garbed his dog in a tiny sweater for the winter walk.
meanings.sent4: The artist garbed the canvas in vibrant hues, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The actors were garbed in elaborate costumes for the Shakespearean play.
